Row.Text: The Rider of the White Horse
Approaching civilizations of all carrying a bow with quivers of germanic arrows. It seems the faithful ones are spared. Others are not.
Our faith shall save us!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_YieldCost}.[ENDCOLOR]
Let it come to us! We have no fear!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Chance to lose 1 [ICON_CITIZEN] Population.[ENDCOLOR]
The Rider of the Red Horse
Approaching civilizations of all carrying a sword. It seems the faithful ones are spared. Others are not.
Our faith shall save us!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_YieldCost}.[ENDCOLOR]
Is that the best it can do?
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Barbarians begin a full assault on all cities.[ENDCOLOR]
The Rider of the Black Horse
Approaching civilizations of all carrying a pair of balances. It seems the faithful ones are spared. Others are not.
Our faith shall save us!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_YieldCost}.[ENDCOLOR]
We're still here, let us continue on.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Barbarians begin a full assault on all cities.[ENDCOLOR]
The Rider of the Pale Horse
Approaching civilizations of all bearing nothing, but the barrens of death. It seems the faithful ones are spared. Others are not.
Our faith shall save us!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_YieldCost}.[ENDCOLOR]
This is our final judgement, we shall hold here.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Barbarians begin a full assault on all cities.[ENDCOLOR]
